amendment.description: Amendment limits the number of personnel in the Office of the Director of National Intelligence to the number of personnel as were serving in the Office on May 1, 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-144 to place a limit on the number of personnel in the Office of the Director of National Intelligence (ODNI). ODNI would only be authorized the number of personnel as were serving in the office on May 1, 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 297 - 122 (Roll no. 338).
